title: Error installing moab on titan, not recognizing mpich module
body:
I'm getting an error trying to install moab (I stripped out the trilinos requirement). it's possible the packages.yaml file isn't correct

sarich@titan-ext2:/ccs/proj/cli112/sarich/spack> ./bin/spack  install moab%pgi

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "./bin/spack", line 192, in <module>
    main()
  File "./bin/spack", line 169, in main
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/autofs/nccs-svm1_proj/cli112/sarich/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/install.py", line 79, in install
    specs = spack.cmd.parse_specs(args.packages, concretize=True)
  File "/autofs/nccs-svm1_proj/cli112/sarich/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/**init**.py", line 106, in parse_specs
    spec.concretize()  # implies normalize
  File "/autofs/nccs-svm1_proj/cli112/sarich/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 1266, in concretize
    self._expand_virtual_packages(),
  File "/autofs/nccs-svm1_proj/cli112/sarich/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 1183, in _expand_virtual_packages
    spec)
  File "/autofs/nccs-svm1_proj/cli112/sarich/spack/lib/spack/spack/concretize.py", line 116, in choose_virtual_or_external
    candidates = self._valid_virtuals_and_externals(spec)
  File "/autofs/nccs-svm1_proj/cli112/sarich/spack/lib/spack/spack/concretize.py", line 108, in _valid_virtuals_and_externals
    usable.sort(cmp=cmp_externals)
  File "/autofs/nccs-svm1_proj/cli112/sarich/spack/lib/spack/spack/concretize.py", line 96, in cmp_externals
    return candidates.index(a) - candidates.index(b)
ValueError: mpich@7.4.0%pgi@15.7.0 arch=cray-CNL-interlagos is not in list

My packages.yaml:

```
packages:
  mpich:
    modules:
      mpich@7.4.0%pgi@15.7.0 arch=cray-CNL-interlagos: cray-mpich
    buildable: False
  netcdf:
    modules:
      netcdf@4.4.0%pgi@15.7.0 arch=cray-CNL-interlagos: cray-netcdf-hdf5parallel/4.4.0
    buildable: False
  hdf5:
    modules:
      hdf5@1.8.16%pgi@15.7.0 arch=cray-CNL-interlagos: cray-hdf5/1.8.16
    buildable: False
  all:
    compiler: [pgi@15.7.0]
    providers:
      mpi: [mpich, openmpi]
      blas: [openblas]
      lapack: [openblas]
```
